item.title: One mockgen flag can make your CI 5x faster
item.description: At work, mock generation was slow: 5 minutes locally, and 15 in CI. That’s long enough that I’d start something else while waiting and forget to come back. Refusing to accept the harsh realities of life, I wondered if we could do better.
